API docs by Redocly

Lythaus (formerly Asora) API (v1)

Download OpenAPI specification:

License: MIT

HTTP contract for Lythaus (formerly Asora) Functions v1.

Feed

Feed retrieval endpoints.

Retrieve personalized feed items

Return a page of feed items.

Authorizations:
bearerAuth
query Parameters
cursor
string

Cursor for pagination

limit
integer [ 1 .. 50 ]

Number of items to return (1-50)

Responses

Azure Functions staging edge endpoint

https://asora-function-dev-c3fyhqcfctdddfa2.northeurope-01.azurewebsites.net/feed

Asora staging domain (set via environment)

https://${STAGING_DOMAIN}/feed

Response samples

  • 200
  • 400
  • 401
  • 403
  • 429
Content type
application/json
{
  • "items": [
    • { }
    ],
  • "meta": {
    • "count": 0,
    • "nextCursor": "string",
    • "timingsMs": {
      • "property1": 0,
      • "property2": 0
      },
    • "applied": { }
    }
}

  • "service": "string",
  • "version": "string"
}

Auth

Authentication and invite access endpoints.

Validate an invite code

Validates an invite code without revealing status details.

query Parameters
code
string

Invite code (format XXXX-XXXX)

Responses

Azure Functions staging edge endpoint

https://asora-function-dev-c3fyhqcfctdddfa2.northeurope-01.azurewebsites.net/auth/invite/validate

Asora staging domain (set via environment)

https://${STAGING_DOMAIN}/auth/invite/validate

Response samples

  • 200
  • 429
  • 500
Content type
application/json
{
  • "success": true,
  • "data": {
    • "valid": true
    },
  • "timestamp": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  • "requestId": "string"
}

Posts

Post authoring endpoints.

Create a new post

Create a new post.

Authorizations:
bearerAuth
Request Body schema: application/json
required
id
required
string <uuid>

Client generated UUID v7 for the new post

text
required
string <= 2000 characters

Post body text

attachments
Array of strings <uri> [ items <uri > ]

Optional media attachments

Responses

Azure Functions staging edge endpoint

https://asora-function-dev-c3fyhqcfctdddfa2.northeurope-01.azurewebsites.net/post

Asora staging domain (set via environment)

https://${STAGING_DOMAIN}/post

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/json
{
  • "id": "018b27d4-5b3b-73e3-bf77-bf7bb9530f21",
  • "text": "string",
  • "attachments": [
    • "http://example.com"
    ]
}

Response samples

  • 201
  • 400
  • 401
  • 403
Content type
application/json
{
  • "id": "018b27d4-7f9b-7d9e-bf0e-9bf93c3fce43",
  • "status": "published"
}

Moderation

Moderation workflows.

Flag content for moderation review

Flag content for review.

Authorizations:
bearerAuth
Request Body schema: application/json
required
targetId
required
string <uuid>

Identifier of the content being flagged

reason
required
string
Enum: "spam" "harassment" "hate_speech" "violence" "adult_content" "misinformation" "copyright" "privacy" "other"

Moderation reason

notes
string <= 1000 characters

Additional details supporting the flag

Responses

Azure Functions staging edge endpoint

https://asora-function-dev-c3fyhqcfctdddfa2.northeurope-01.azurewebsites.net/moderation/flag

Asora staging domain (set via environment)

https://${STAGING_DOMAIN}/moderation/flag

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/json
{
  • "targetId": "018b27d4-6e1e-7bd3-bb5a-98f24bb968c2",
  • "reason": "spam",
  • "notes": "string"
}

Response samples

  • 202
  • 400
  • 401
  • 403
Content type
application/json
{
  • "flagId": "018b27d4-83fd-7fff-b5e1-8e779ebf8eab",
  • "status": "queued"
}

Admin

Lythaus admin moderation and safety operations.

List flagged content queue

Returns grouped flagged content for admin triage.

Authorizations:
bearerAuth
query Parameters
status
string
Enum: "open" "resolved" "all"

Filter by queue status

cursor
string

Cursor for pagination

limit
integer [ 1 .. 100 ]

Number of items to return (1-100)

Responses

Azure Functions staging edge endpoint

https://asora-function-dev-c3fyhqcfctdddfa2.northeurope-01.azurewebsites.net/_admin/flags

Asora staging domain (set via environment)

  • 401
  • 403
Content type
application/json
{
  • "items": [
    • {
      • "content": {
        • "contentId": "string",
        • "type": "post",
        • "createdAt": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
        • "preview": "string"
        },
      • "author": {
        • "authorId": "string",
        • "displayName": "string",
        • "handle": "string"
        },
      • "flags": {
        • "flagId": "string",
        • "flagCount": 0,
        • "reasonCategories": [
          • "string"
          ],
        • "lastFlaggedAt": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z"
        },
      • "state": "PUBLISHED",
      • "moderation": {
        • "lastDecisionAt": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
        • "configVersionUsed": 0,
        • "reasonCodes": [
          • "string"
          ]
        },
      • "status": "OPEN"
      }
    ],
  • "nextCursor": "string",
  • "count": 0

required
reasonCode
required
string
note
string

Responses

Block content

bearerAuth
path Parameters
contentId
required
string

Content identifier

Request Body schema: application/json
required
contentType
required
string (AdminContentType)
Enum: "post" "comment" "user"
reasonCode
required
string
note
string

Responses

Azure Functions staging edge endpoint

string

Override an appeal

Moderator override for appeal outcomes. Idempotent per appeal.

Authorizations:
bearerAuth
path Parameters
appealId
required
string

Appeal identifier

header Parameters
Idempotency-Key
string

Idempotency key for safe retries

Request Body schema: application/json
required
decision
required
string (AdminAppealFinalDecision)
Enum: "allow" "block"
reasonCode
required
string
Enum: "policy_exception" "false_positive" "safety_risk" "other"
reasonNote
string <= 500 characters

Responses

Azure Functions staging edge endpoint

https://asora-function-dev-c3fyhqcfctdddfa2.northeurope-01.azurewebsites.net/_admin/appeals/{appealId}/override

Asora staging domain (set via environment)

https://${STAGING_DOMAIN}/_admin/appeals/{appealId}/override

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/json
{
  • "decision": "allow",
  • "reasonCode": "policy_exception",
  • "reasonNote": "string"
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 400
  • 401
  • 403
  • 404
  • 409
Content type
application/json
{
  • "appealId": "string",
  • "status": "overridden",
  • "finalDecision": "allow"
}

      • "maxUses": 0,
      • "usageCount": 0,
      • "lastUsedAt": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
      • "status": "ACTIVE",
      • "label": "string",
      • "usedByUserId": "string"
      }
    ]
}

Privacy

User data and privacy controls.

Privacy Admin

Data Subject Request and legal hold administration.

Enqueue a Data Subject Request export

Queues an export job for a user's data as part of GDPR/CCPA compliance. Returns immediately with job tracking info.

Authorizations:
bearerAuth
Request Body schema: application/json
required
userId
required
string
note
string

Responses

Azure Functions staging edge endpoint

https://asora-function-dev-c3fyhqcfctdddfa2.northeurope-01.azurewebsites.net/admin/dsr/export

Asora staging domain (set via environment)

https://${STAGING_DOMAIN}/admin/dsr/export

Place a legal hold

Places a legal hold on a user's data, preventing deletion until the hold is cleared. Used for litigation or regulatory preservation.

Authorizations:
bearerAuth
Request Body schema: application/json
required
scope
required
string
Enum: "user" "post" "case"
scopeId
required
string
reason
required
string
